_info.description: Blur detected objects based on COCO class names
_info.overlay_blur: Array of COCO class names to blur (required)
_info.blur_strength: Blur intensity: 0=auto, pixelate:8-32, gaussian/median:15-51 (must be odd)
_info.expand_box: Expand bounding box before blur: true/false
_info.expand_pixels: Pixels to expand box: 0=auto 10% if expand_box=true, or fixed pixel value
